reactions from the COVID-19) vaccines.
attributes.additional_details:
Many people with ME are suffering disproportionately compared to the the general population with serious adverse reactions.

Not only have we been impacted physically, but mentally and financially as well. 

They have the data, the research.
However the medical profession have neglected to disclose these reactions to the public.

We have notified our health professionals to no avail.
Many of us are suffering in silence, afraid of the backlash if our voices are heard.
attributes.background:
We are a growing group of people who are experiencing severe adverse reactions resulting from the COVID-19) vaccines.

We the V injured need our government to take on board our health and wellbeing ,sadly no one is willing.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local authorities are responsible for setting criteria as guidelines to help them decide when it is
necessary to carry out an EHC needs assessment (and following assessment, to
decide whether it is necessary to issue an EHC plan).  The Government doesn't provide a specific list of conditions for assessment. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
